description: Directory of registered lobbyists and their respective clients. This list includes both current and past clients for each lobbyist. Lobbyist clients are disclosed by lobbyists registered with the Public Ethics Commission on a quarterly basis in compliance with the Lobbyist Registration Act. This dataset is updated weekly.

metadata.attribution: City of Oakland Public Ethics Commission
